comments:
Using N0601-2004 build.

In RuntimeInformation section I have 3 libraries.  I reordered them with the
up/down buttons, looked at source, it looked good.  I reordered them again
(several more up/down routines), looked at source, and found it in the wrong order. 

The outline view showed them in the correct order so I clicked on the libraries
there.  Got the error below.

Playing around with the order even more after this starts replicating libraries
in source (i.e. I had two entries for abc.jar after trying to move abc.jar up in
the list).
